DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect on comorbid disease and weight loss five years after Roux-en-Y gastric bypass (RYGB) surgery for morbid obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Comorbidity Five Years After Gastric Bypass
DOC.detailed_description: Morbid obese patient frequently have comorbid diseases, e.g. diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and sleep apnea. We will study the remission rate and weight loss five years after Roux-en-Y gastric bypass (RYGB) surgery in a nationwide large group of patients.
DOC.criteria: Registered individuals in Scandinavian Obesity Surgery Registry (SOReg) having had gastric bypass All other operations
